desc: prepare a 10min presentation max on "how you plan to hit the ground running if you get the job". Please feel free to be as creative as you want.Another slide on Era foods are a UK based food manufacturer with a range of their own brands sold widely in a range of large and small retailers. Their products cover a number of food categories including snacks, bakery, cooking sauces and desserts.Recently they have been working on a new range of ready meals and complimentary desserts. In this new product development work, there has been a focus on healthy foods including provision of a number of gluten free options.Although the gluten free market is new to All New Foods they are aware that it is an expanding area and have decided that if these new ready meals and desserts are successful they will look at making more of their existing product ranges gluten free.All New Foods Ltd have approached Coeliac UK to find out more about our work in the gluten free sector and explore if there are options to work with us.As part of the team meeting All New Foods you have been asked to prepare and deliver a ten minute presentation about Coeliac UK and our work and the options available to All New Foods for working with us and marketing their products out to our members.
title: Sales presentation -- 2

desc: I am looking for local Sales Agents with an ambitious attitude to help grow a language services business.Sales Agents should hold as minimum a college or university degree, speak fluently English and be a native speaker with a perfect command both verbal and written of the country language they will engage as sales agent. You must be able to make your own research to find leads and potential clients. Excellent computer and social media skills are required and preference will be given to those having a strong social media presence and an existing network. Strong numeracy skills are needed. The Sales Agent should have a track record of success in business development and relationship management and excellent interpersonal, communication and organization skills.The freelancer sought must have in-depth skills in sales planning & selling, at least 3 years of experience in closing sales and an existing network to whom s/he could promote our services that include language related services, mostly translation, editing, proofreading, transcription, subtitling and so on.The ideal Sales Agent should be able to demonstrate the following:-  A successful track record selling into the target market-  High motivation and desire to achieve-  A good network of existing clients-  May already be selling complementary products or servicesWith your bid you have to answer:1. What is your sales experience and track record2. How you plan to sell our services3. Location you wish to cover (country or state)4. Your strengths that will make this project a successThis is an opportunity to work independently. You may work as little or as much as you like. The project is commission based, not a virtual assistant job and the potential earnings are very high. You'll need to demonstrate a high level of accuracy, be highly organised and have a high level of integrity and work ethic.
title: Sales agents in various countries
